head.title: Arts, Briefly; Tony, We Love You

identified-content.object.title: Sopranos, the (TV Program)

hedline.hl1: Arts, Briefly; Tony, We Love You

body.head.byline: By JACQUES STEINBERG; Compiled by Peter Edidin

abstract.p: Basic-cable premiere of series The Sopranos on A&E attracts 4.3 million viewers (S)

block.p: Original episodes and reruns of ''The Sopranos'' have been running on HBO since 1999 and are on DVD. But that didn't stop 4.3 million viewers from watching the basic-cable premiere of the series's first episode on Wednesday night on A&E, according to Nielsen estimates released by the channel. A&E, which is planning to run two episodes of the series each Wednesday night (edited for language, violence and nudity), said its debut showing was well above its prime-time average last year (by more than 200 percent) and good enough to beat the ratings of any other advertiser-supported cable channel that night.
